title: Rin Will!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Umi-chaaan! Umi-chan, Umi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What is it, Rin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Umm, please practice dancing with me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Sure, but why all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>You see, Kayochin told me she got the hang of a step she wasn’t good at when she practiced with you, Umi-chan. Rin also wanted to practice with Kayochin nya....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Aaah.... Now that you mentioned it, I did join Hanayo on her secret practice that morning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin wishes Rin could have taught Kayochin better~. Rin is so frustrated!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Oh, I see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>So, Umi-chan, please teach me how to teach other people better!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I understand! Fufu, you really love Hanayo, don’t you, Rin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
